name: Dodge Ball (Mewters)
description:
Description

Hit the ball on your opponent who is dodging through the environment.

If you run out of balls, Game Over!

How to Play

Move the mouse to aim

Left Click - Shoot

You can get the ball that is backing to avoid lost it

Avoid hitting others that are not your opponent

You will lose a ball if you hit windows, broken fences and bushes

You will get an extra ball if you hit the +1 target
